title: Learning Node.js
contents: Node.js is a cross-platform, open-source server environment that can run on Windows, Linux, Unix, macOS, and more.

title: Why do I love Javascript?
contents: I love javascript because it is easier, it is almost everywhere, a single language for everything, it is present and future of web, it is simple

title: Why use Sequelize?
contents: Sequelize is a powerful library in Javascript that makes it easy to manage a SQL database. Sequelize can layer over different protocols, but here we'll use PostgreSQL. At its core, Sequelize is an Object-Relational Mapper â€“ meaning that it maps an object syntax onto our database schemas.

title: Why use Handlebars
contents: Handlebars. js and HTML5 are primarily classified as 'Templating Languages & Extensions' and 'Languages' tools respectively. 'Simple' is the primary reason why developers consider Handlebars. js over the competitors, whereas 'New doctype' was stated as the key factor in picking HTML5.
